subject: Horse Racing
Santa Anita Derby
lead_paragraph: Dortmund overcame a stumble out of the gate to lead every step of the way in an emphatic victory at the Santa Anita Derby, and remained undefeated.
snippet: Dortmund overcame a stumble out of the gate to lead every step of the way in an emphatic victory at the Santa Anita Derby, and remained undefeated.
